title: Error launching
body:
In Slackware 14.2, i3-gaps wm.  I ofter get the following error when starting polybar. I managed to do a dirty fix running polybar in an infinite loop till it stays running.

terminate called after throwing an instance of 'xpp::x::error::match'
what():  XCB_MATCH (8)
author: slacky90

Instead of running `cmake ..` you will have to run `cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug ..` in order to compile in debug mode. The rest of the compilation steps are the same as before.
